title: Sustainable Science Projects for Critical Thinking and Civic Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational science knowledge and awareness of social issues
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing practical scientific inquiry for community problem-solving, where learners participate in data collection/analysis using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze local environmental issues and propose solutions grounded in scientific evidence.
Learners understand the importance of linking Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and can design citizen participation projects.
Learners can derive improved solutions through peer evaluation and feedback in collaborative learning settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
